original_text:
He will give back the fruit of his toil
    and will not swallow it down;
from the profit of his trading
    he will get no enjoyment.
korean_text: 수고하여 얻은 것을 삼키지 못하고 돌려 주며 매매하여 얻은 재물로 즐거움을 삼지 못하리니

sentences.original_text: He will give back the fruit of his toil
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 수고의 열매를 돌려줄 것이다

sentences.original_text: and will not swallow it down
from the profit of his trading

sentences.korean_translation: 그는 아무 즐거움도 얻지 못할 것이다
